name: Emergency Trauma Foam
description: A can full of water-soluble ETF, or Emergency Trauma Foam. When sprayed on a wound ETF rapidly expands, stopping bleeding, acting as a local painkiller, and also disinfecting the wound. Still not as good as a porper first aid kit.

use_action.activation_message: You shake the can and spray the foam in the wound. Ouch.

name: XE037 Emergency Injection
description: The latest miracle medicine stocked in hospitals pre-cataclysm, held within the scariest needle you've ever seen. Reputed to end the flesh before the eyes and punch your stomach into next week.

use_action.activation_message: You slam the needle in and begin to feel the sensation of flesh crawling together...
